user_query: I want to create a BMI calculator for my website.

TaskList.description: Research APIs that provide BMI calculation functionalities including support for different units of measurement.
Evaluate the selected APIs for their ability to categorize weight based on BMI results.
Choose the most suitable API that fits the requirements for both BMI calculation and weight categorization.
Integrate the chosen API into the website and ensure that the BMI calculator is functional.
Test the BMI calculator to ensure accurate calculations and proper weight categorization.
